Introducing CaseWare Cloud


It's time to start running your practice more effeciently, using the latest technolgy to better meet your client's needs.

 Click here to learn more

All the Apps you need on one platform.


Simply choose the apps that best suit your practice's needs and start working from the cloud today.

Engagement Management

Productivity

A simple, easy-to-use solution that helps you manage your practice the smart way.


One Cloud. Unlimited Possibilities.

Client Portal

Gone are the days of email. Clients and stakeholders can now also interact through the same tools, collaborating with you in real-time.

Engagement Management

Manage every engagement with Caseware's Q app. Use Review on the Go to review working papers from anywhere.

Online CRM

All your contacts, clients and staff in one convenient location making this the go-to destination for anything engagement related.





Tax Management

TaxWare takes care of all of the administrative tasks associated with tax compliance for corporates, trusts and individuals.

Statutory Management

With SecWare, take care of compliance including all new forms (MOI and CoR) and terminology as required by the new Companies Act.





Time & Expenses

With Time on the Go, you can easily capture time and expenses wherever you are. Manage your WIP and bill your clients all from one place.

Analytics

The CaseWare Analytics solutions allow internal audit and business stakeholders to independently monitor controls across multiple businesses and systems.

Online File Storage

SmartSync lets staff work on local Working Papers engagement files with all their changes seamlessly syncing to the master cloud copy.



 View the full feature list here

Plans & Pricing


How much does CaseWare Cloud cost?


Trial Plan

Free

First 1GB storage free

Standard features included:
  • Individual user login
  • 1GB Storage
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Upgrade to paid plan when 1GB limit is reached

Paid Plan

R50

per user per month**

or R500 per user per year (Billed Annually)
Standard features included:
  • Individual user login
  • 5GB Storage per user/month
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Additional Storage: $5 for 5GB per month

**Individual Apps sold separately. Contact your account manager today for a quote.
